Welcome to Jekyll!

2014年10月24日 jekyllupdate

hi,欢迎来到my first post

Jekyll powerful support for code snippets:

def print_hi(name)
  puts "Hi, #{name}"
end
print_hi('Tom')
#=> prints 'Hi, Tom' to STDOUT.

python 的高级特性：

a=[1,3,4,5,6,7,8,]
print a[1:5]
得到 [3,4,5,6,7]
  • Check here for more imformation.
  • If you have any questions, 点击 here.
